#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int lev(int n,int  m,int a[],int b[])
{
    int dp[n+1][m+1];int cost;
    memset(dp,0,sizeof(dp));
    dp[0][0]=0;int i,j;
    for(i=1;i<=n;i++)
        dp[i][0]=i; ///i deletions
    for(j=1;j<=m;j++)
        dp[0][j]=j;///j additions
    for(i=1;i<=n;i++)
        for(j=1;j<=m;j++)
    {
        if(a[i-1]==b[j-1])
             cost=0;
        else
             cost=1;

    dp[i][j]=min(min(dp[i-1][j]+1,dp[i][j-1]+1),dp[i-1][j-1]+cost);

    }
      return dp[n][m];
}

 main()
{
    int t;
    scanf("%d",&t);
    while(t--)
    {
          int n,m,i,a[200],b[200];
          scanf("%d",&n);
          for(i=0;i<n;i++)
            scanf("%d",&a[i]);
        scanf("%d",&m);
           for(i=0;i<m;i++)
            scanf("%d",&b[i]);

      int ans=lev(n,m,a,b);
      printf("%d\n",ans);
    }
}
